posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

4/18/22 - 4/24/22
Issue - V99
Current Release: 1.8.1

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Updates

  • Follow the #30daysofStreamlit challenge on Twitter or LinkedIn!
    — Check out the day 29 tutorial by @Charly_Wargnier
  • Learn how Streamlit helped the analytics team at The Stable scale and democratize their data.

Featured Content

  • Jina NOW - The one-liner Neural Search
  • spacy-streamlit update
  • Deploy Machine Learning Web Applications with Streamlit

Tutorials/Introduction

  • Machine Learning Model Deployment Using Streamlit
  • Embedding code snippets in streamlit webapp
  • Finally a working Login Screen in streamlit and tap dancing with Session State and Lambda + MySQL
  • Streamlit Audio to Text Converter Web App | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Tutorial 3
  • Streamlit Audio to Text Converter Web App | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Tutorial 4
  • Breathing life into Streamlit with Materialize & Redpanda
  • Sparse Transformers | A Demo
  • The Easiest Way to Deploy Your ML/DL Models in 2022: Streamlit + BentoML + DagsHub
  • Should you build your next app in Streamlit?
  • Deploy Streamlit app to Heroku
  • 3 Easy Ways to Deploy your Streamlit Web App Online
  • Building Cool Applications with Streamlit and Snowflake
  • Create NFT Generative Art Collections: Using a simple NFT generator, made with Streamlit
  • Emotion based music recommendation system(Opencv-python)
  • Bot and Employee Onboarding
  • streamlit authenticatorを用いてログインページを作る
  • [新手Python 應用搭建指南] 4. 專案雲端佈屬 +新專案食譜選擇器
  • Two step process to showcase data science project as web application on AWS
  • Making a Movie Recommendation App using Streamlit and Docker (Part-2)
  • Lighting up your Data Science engine with Streamlit framework
  • Databricksでワイン品質予測モデルをトレーニングしてStreamlit Cloudからモデルを呼び出す
  • Predicting how a customer will feel about a product before they even ordered it
  • 理系でも出来るお釣り計算機
  • Build your Own Stock Portfolio Optimizer Web App with Streamlit
  • Bar Charts – Learning Streamlit with Bar Charts
  • Showcase your DataScience project with a WebApp

Science and Tech

  • Basis Set Converter Web Application

NLP and Language

  • Python News Content Aggregator App With Streamlit
  • Caption Generator Bahasa
  • Neural Magic
  • Translate text with Opus-MT
  • iNeuron Project Demo - News Article Sorting
  • Streamlit Ukraine Russian War Sentiment Analysis Tracker Deployed on AWS ECS
  • A quiz based on Narada Bhakti Sutra with Streamlit and VanillaJS

  • Predicting Intergenerational Mobility in the USA
